author: OpenJS Foundation
title: Security Compliance Guide v1.0 - Incubating
description: This checklist is for projects that are in the incubating phase and have multiple maintainers.

checks.title: Training on OWASP Top 10 or equivalent
checks.description: At least one primary maintainer has taken the training on OWASP Top 10 or Equivalent

checks.title: Enforce MFA in npm organization(s)
checks.description: Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) enforced across the npm organization(s)

checks.title: Enforce MFA in all the tools
checks.description: Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) enforced in all tools wherever technically feasible

checks.title: Use MFA against impersonation
checks.description: Use Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) methods that defend against impersonation when available

checks.title: Check sensitive information
checks.description: No secrets or credentials are included in the source code

checks.title: Ensure that the secrets are injected at runtime
checks.description: Secrets are injected at runtime, such as environment variables or as a file (eg: use Github Secrets)

checks.title: Ensure that all the commits are scanned
checks.description: All commits are scanned for secrets and credentials

checks.title: Block new commits with secrets or credentials
checks.description: New commits containing secrets or credentials are blocked from merging

checks.title: Use SSH keys with passphrases for repository access
checks.description: Use SSH keys for developer access to source code repositories and use a passphrase

checks.title: Publish to npm using MFA-Enabled accounts
checks.description: Publish to npm using an MFA-enabled account rather than single factor legacy or granular access tokens

checks.title: Secure GitHub Webhooks with secrets
checks.description: Ensure that Github Webhooks use secrets

checks.title: Require code owners review
checks.description: Require code owners review

checks.title: Restrict default GitHub Org member permissions
checks.description: Default GitHub organization member permissions should be restricted

checks.title: Allow only admins to create public repositories
checks.description: Only admins should be able to create public repositories

checks.title: Prevent admins from bypassing branch protection
checks.description: Do not allow admins to bypass branch protection settings

checks.title: Define roles aligned to functional responsibilities
checks.description: Define roles aligned to functional responsibilities

checks.title: Define teams/individuals with write access to repositories
checks.description: Define individuals/teams who write access to a GitHub Repository

checks.title: Configure two or more owners for access continuity
checks.description: Have at least two owners configured for access continuity

checks.title: Patch actively exploited critical vulnerabilities within 30 Days
checks.description: Actively exploited critical vulnerabilities patched within 30 Days

checks.title: Patch non-critical vulnerabilities within 90 days
checks.description: Ensure non-critical exploitable vulnerabilities are patched within 90 days

checks.title: Automate dependency vulnerability identification
checks.description: Implement an automated process to identify dependencies with publicly disclosed vulnerabilities

checks.title: Use automated static code analysis tools
checks.description: Implement automated static code analysis tools (e.g., ESLint)

checks.title: Address compiler and linter warnings before merging
checks.description: Ensure all compiler and linter warnings are resolved before merging

checks.title: Use static application security testing for all commits
checks.description: Ensure all commits are scanned by a static application security testing tool

checks.title: Require commit status checks to pass before merging
checks.description: Ensure all required commit status checks pass before merging

checks.title: Ensure Security.md meets OpenJS CVD guidelines
checks.description: Verify that Security.md complies with OpenJS CVD guidelines

checks.title: Use CVD tools to manage vulnerability reports
checks.description: Ensure the project utilizes a CVD tool to privately receive and manage external vulnerability reports (e.g., HackerOne, GitHub PVR)

checks.title: Respond to external vulnerability reports in under 14 days
checks.description: Ensure all external vulnerability reports are addressed within 14 days

checks.title: Define clear communication and incident response plans
checks.description: Establish clear communication and incident response plans

checks.title: Assign CVEs to all known security vulnerabilities
checks.description: Ensure all known security vulnerabilities are issued a CVE

checks.title: Include CVE IDs in release notes for security fixes
checks.description: Ensure release notes include the CVE ID for patched security vulnerabilities

checks.title: Create regression tests for bugs and security vulnerabilities
checks.description: Ensure regression tests cover at least 50% of bugs and 100% of security vulnerabilities

checks.title: Set default GitHub workflow token permissions to read-only
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization default workflow token permissions are set to read-only

checks.title: Prevent workflows from creating or approving PRs
checks.description: Ensure workflows are not allowed to create or approve pull requests

checks.title: Disable force push on default branch
checks.description: Ensure force push is disabled on the default branch

checks.title: Prevent deletion of default branch
checks.description: Ensure the default branch cannot be deleted

checks.title: Require default branch updates before merging
checks.description: Ensure the default branch is up to date before allowing merges

checks.title: Restrict GitHub organization secrets to specific repositories
checks.description: Limit GitHub organization secrets to only be accessible by selected repositories

checks.title: Limit GitHub Actions to verified or trusted actions
checks.description: Ensure GitHub Actions are limited to verified or explicitly trusted actions

checks.title: Disable self-hosted runners in GitHub organization
checks.description: Ensure the use of self-hosted runners is disabled in the GitHub organization

checks.title: Restrict build pipeline code execution to build scripts
checks.description: Ensure the build pipeline cannot execute arbitrary code outside of a build script

checks.title: Limit workflow write permissions to job level
checks.description: Ensure workflows are granted write permissions only at the job level

checks.title: Avoid script injection from untrusted variables
checks.description: Ensure script injection is prevented by avoiding untrusted context variables

checks.title: Document consistent and automated build processes
checks.description: Ensure a consistent and automated build process is documented and followed

checks.title: Support older versions or provide upgrade paths
checks.description: Ensure commonly used older versions are supported or an upgrade path is documented and provided

checks.title: Document software architecture
checks.description: Ensure the software architecture is clearly documented

checks.title: Automate CI/CD steps in code-based pipelines
checks.description: Ensure all CI/CD steps are automated through pipelines defined as code

checks.title: Pin actions with secrets to full-length commit SHAs
checks.description: Ensure actions with access to secrets are pinned to a full-length commit SHA

checks.title: Automate monitoring of outdated dependencies
checks.description: Ensure an automated process is in place to monitor and maintain a list of outdated dependencies

checks.title: Provide machine-readable dependency lists
checks.description: Ensure a machine-readable list of all direct and transitive dependencies is available for the software

checks.title: Uniquely identify modified dependencies
checks.description: Ensure modified dependencies are uniquely identified and clearly distinguished from the original dependency

checks.title: Refresh dependencies with annual releases
checks.description: Ensure dependencies are refreshed through a new release at least once annually

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys for GitHub access
checks.description: Ensure GitHub access utilizes a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys for non-interactive GitHub access
checks.description: Ensure non-interactive GitHub access uses a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys in all other contexts
checks.description: Ensure all other contexts use a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Require approval for forked workflow changes
checks.description: Ensure changes to workflows from forks require approval for all outside collaborators

checks.title: Use workflow security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a workflow security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Use GitHub runner security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a GitHub runner security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Require active admins in GitHub organization (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization admins have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require active members with write access (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization members with write permissions have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require pull requests before merging
checks.description: Require pull requests before merging

checks.title: Enforce commit sign-off for web based commits
checks.description: GitHub org requires commit sign-off for web-based commits

checks.title: Require signed commits
checks.description: Require signed commits

checks.title: Include package-lock.json in releases
checks.description: Commit a package-lock.json file with each release

checks.title: Require two-party review
checks.description: Require two party review

checks.title: Require approved PRs for mainline commits
checks.description: Require approved PRs for all commits to mainline branches

checks.title: Limit GitHub org owners to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit the number of GitHub org owners (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Limit GitHub repo admins to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit number of GitHub repository admins (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Patch critical/high vulnerabilities in 14 Days
checks.description: Actively exploited critical and high vulnerabilities patched within 14 Days

checks.title: Patch non-critical vulnerabilities in 60 Days
checks.description: Non-critical exploitable vulnerabilities patched within 60 Days

checks.title: Enforce MFA in GitHub organization(s)
checks.description: Multi Factor authentication (MFA) enforced across the Github Organization(s)

checks.title: Training on secure software design
checks.description: At least one primary maintainer has taken the training on Secure Software Design

checks.description: Ensure GitHub access utilizes a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys for non-interactive GitHub access
checks.description: Ensure non-interactive GitHub access uses a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys in all other contexts
checks.description: Ensure all other contexts use a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Require approval for forked workflow changes
checks.description: Ensure changes to workflows from forks require approval for all outside collaborators

checks.title: Use workflow security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a workflow security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Use GitHub runner security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a GitHub runner security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Require active admins in GitHub organization (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization admins have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require active members with write access (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization members with write permissions have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require pull requests before merging
checks.description: Require pull requests before merging

checks.title: Enforce commit sign-off for web based commits
checks.description: GitHub org requires commit sign-off for web-based commits

checks.title: Require signed commits
checks.description: Require signed commits

checks.title: Include package-lock.json in releases
checks.description: Commit a package-lock.json file with each release

checks.title: Limit GitHub org owners to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit the number of GitHub org owners (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Limit GitHub repo admins to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit number of GitHub repository admins (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Patch critical/high vulnerabilities in 14 Days
checks.description: Actively exploited critical and high vulnerabilities patched within 14 Days

checks.title: Patch non-critical vulnerabilities in 60 Days
checks.description: Non-critical exploitable vulnerabilities patched within 60 Days

checks.title: Enforce MFA in GitHub organization(s)
checks.description: Multi Factor authentication (MFA) enforced across the Github Organization(s)

checks.title: Training on secure software design
checks.description: At least one primary maintainer has taken the training on Secure Software Design

author: OpenJS Foundation
title: Security Compliance Guide v1.0 - Solo Maintainers Active
description: This checklist is for projects that are in the active phase and have a solo maintainer.

checks.title: Training on OWASP Top 10 or equivalent
checks.description: At least one primary maintainer has taken the training on OWASP Top 10 or Equivalent

checks.title: Enforce MFA in npm organization(s)
checks.description: Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) enforced across the npm organization(s)

checks.title: Enforce MFA in all the tools
checks.description: Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) enforced in all tools wherever technically feasible

checks.title: Use MFA against impersonation
checks.description: Use Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) methods that defend against impersonation when available

checks.title: Check sensitive information
checks.description: No secrets or credentials are included in the source code

checks.title: Ensure that the secrets are injected at runtime
checks.description: Secrets are injected at runtime, such as environment variables or as a file (eg: use Github Secrets)

checks.title: Ensure that all the commits are scanned
checks.description: All commits are scanned for secrets and credentials

checks.title: Block new commits with secrets or credentials
checks.description: New commits containing secrets or credentials are blocked from merging

checks.title: Use SSH keys with passphrases for repository access
checks.description: Use SSH keys for developer access to source code repositories and use a passphrase

checks.title: Publish to npm using MFA-Enabled accounts
checks.description: Publish to npm using an MFA-enabled account rather than single factor legacy or granular access tokens

checks.title: Secure GitHub Webhooks with secrets
checks.description: Ensure that Github Webhooks use secrets

checks.title: Require code owners review
checks.description: Require code owners review

checks.title: Restrict default GitHub Org member permissions
checks.description: Default GitHub organization member permissions should be restricted

checks.title: Allow only admins to create public repositories
checks.description: Only admins should be able to create public repositories

checks.title: Define roles aligned to functional responsibilities
checks.description: Define roles aligned to functional responsibilities

checks.title: Define teams/individuals with write access to repositories
checks.description: Define individuals/teams who write access to a GitHub Repository

checks.title: Patch actively exploited critical vulnerabilities within 30 Days
checks.description: Actively exploited critical vulnerabilities patched within 30 Days

checks.title: Patch non-critical vulnerabilities within 90 days
checks.description: Ensure non-critical exploitable vulnerabilities are patched within 90 days

checks.title: Automate dependency vulnerability identification
checks.description: Implement an automated process to identify dependencies with publicly disclosed vulnerabilities

checks.title: Use automated static code analysis tools
checks.description: Implement automated static code analysis tools (e.g., ESLint)

checks.title: Address compiler and linter warnings before merging
checks.description: Ensure all compiler and linter warnings are resolved before merging

checks.title: Use static application security testing for all commits
checks.description: Ensure all commits are scanned by a static application security testing tool

checks.title: Require commit status checks to pass before merging
checks.description: Ensure all required commit status checks pass before merging

checks.title: Ensure Security.md meets OpenJS CVD guidelines
checks.description: Verify that Security.md complies with OpenJS CVD guidelines

checks.title: Use CVD tools to manage vulnerability reports
checks.description: Ensure the project utilizes a CVD tool to privately receive and manage external vulnerability reports (e.g., HackerOne, GitHub PVR)

checks.title: Respond to external vulnerability reports in under 14 days
checks.description: Ensure all external vulnerability reports are addressed within 14 days

checks.title: Define clear communication and incident response plans
checks.description: Establish clear communication and incident response plans

checks.title: Assign CVEs to all known security vulnerabilities
checks.description: Ensure all known security vulnerabilities are issued a CVE

checks.title: Include CVE IDs in release notes for security fixes
checks.description: Ensure release notes include the CVE ID for patched security vulnerabilities

checks.title: Create regression tests for bugs and security vulnerabilities
checks.description: Ensure regression tests cover at least 50% of bugs and 100% of security vulnerabilities

checks.title: Set default GitHub workflow token permissions to read-only
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization default workflow token permissions are set to read-only

checks.title: Prevent workflows from creating or approving PRs
checks.description: Ensure workflows are not allowed to create or approve pull requests

checks.title: Disable force push on default branch
checks.description: Ensure force push is disabled on the default branch

checks.title: Prevent deletion of default branch
checks.description: Ensure the default branch cannot be deleted

checks.title: Require default branch updates before merging
checks.description: Ensure the default branch is up to date before allowing merges

checks.title: Restrict GitHub organization secrets to specific repositories
checks.description: Limit GitHub organization secrets to only be accessible by selected repositories

checks.title: Limit GitHub Actions to verified or trusted actions
checks.description: Ensure GitHub Actions are limited to verified or explicitly trusted actions

checks.title: Disable self-hosted runners in GitHub organization
checks.description: Ensure the use of self-hosted runners is disabled in the GitHub organization

checks.title: Restrict build pipeline code execution to build scripts
checks.description: Ensure the build pipeline cannot execute arbitrary code outside of a build script

checks.title: Limit workflow write permissions to job level
checks.description: Ensure workflows are granted write permissions only at the job level

checks.title: Avoid script injection from untrusted variables
checks.description: Ensure script injection is prevented by avoiding untrusted context variables

checks.title: Document consistent and automated build processes
checks.description: Ensure a consistent and automated build process is documented and followed

checks.title: Support older versions or provide upgrade paths
checks.description: Ensure commonly used older versions are supported or an upgrade path is documented and provided

checks.title: Automate CI/CD steps in code-based pipelines
checks.description: Ensure all CI/CD steps are automated through pipelines defined as code

checks.title: Pin actions with secrets to full-length commit SHAs
checks.description: Ensure actions with access to secrets are pinned to a full-length commit SHA

checks.title: Automate monitoring of outdated dependencies
checks.description: Ensure an automated process is in place to monitor and maintain a list of outdated dependencies

checks.title: Provide machine-readable dependency lists
checks.description: Ensure a machine-readable list of all direct and transitive dependencies is available for the software

checks.title: Uniquely identify modified dependencies
checks.description: Ensure modified dependencies are uniquely identified and clearly distinguished from the original dependency

checks.title: Refresh dependencies with annual releases
checks.description: Ensure dependencies are refreshed through a new release at least once annually

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys for GitHub access
checks.description: Ensure GitHub access utilizes a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys for non-interactive GitHub access
checks.description: Ensure non-interactive GitHub access uses a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Use AAL2/3 passkeys in all other contexts
checks.description: Ensure all other contexts use a passkey (AAL2) or hardware key (AAL3) activated by a password or biometrics

checks.title: Require approval for forked workflow changes
checks.description: Ensure changes to workflows from forks require approval for all outside collaborators

checks.title: Use workflow security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a workflow security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Use GitHub runner security scanners
checks.description: Ensure a GitHub runner security scanner is utilized

checks.title: Require active admins in GitHub organization (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization admins have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require active members with write access (activity in 6 months)
checks.description: Ensure GitHub organization members with write permissions have been active within the last 6 months

checks.title: Require pull requests before merging
checks.description: Require pull requests before merging

checks.title: Enforce commit sign-off for web based commits
checks.description: GitHub org requires commit sign-off for web-based commits

checks.title: Require signed commits
checks.description: Require signed commits

checks.title: Include package-lock.json in releases
checks.description: Commit a package-lock.json file with each release

checks.title: Limit GitHub org owners to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit the number of GitHub org owners (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Limit GitHub repo admins to fewer than three
checks.description: Limit number of GitHub repository admins (ideally fewer than three)

checks.title: Patch critical/high vulnerabilities in 14 Days
checks.description: Actively exploited critical and high vulnerabilities patched within 14 Days

checks.title: Patch non-critical vulnerabilities in 60 Days
checks.description: Non-critical exploitable vulnerabilities patched within 60 Days

checks.title: Enforce MFA in GitHub organization(s)
checks.description: Multi Factor authentication (MFA) enforced across the Github Organization(s)

checks.title: Training on secure software design
checks.description: At least one primary maintainer has taken the training on Secure Software Design
